Text: Thank you. I saw on the comment section on your race upload that someone requested the BBC forum. Thank you for taking requests and fulfilling them.

Thanks for all your work this season @footy. My first season with F1, now I am hooked for life. Getting the torrents from you have played a big part in that. Especially posting BBC and Sky for options. And love the Inside Grand Prix.
Thanks. See you ext year.
Thank you immensely for your titanic effort all season in bringing all of these uploads to those of us who do not get the best of coverage in our little corners of the world.

Thank you immensely for your titanic effort all season in bringing all of these uploads to those of us who do not get the best of coverage in our little corners of the world.  These races and the attached forums are greatly appreciated.

@ Billy3030: Don't you think that using "Titanic" as an adjective in this case is a bit going overboard? :-)

Anyway, thanks footy AND seeders.
